name: Armando Hernandez
text: Ferrari cars have always got something unique in them.Being perfect for speeding on the tracks Ferrari 458-Italia is a car that I am looking forward to. It drives me crazy.

name: Bryar Boyle
text: This is the ultimate coupe designed on four wheels for those like me who are destined to beat the racing tracks. Although it is expensive, the pricing fits perfectly with the outstanding features that the car bears in it.

name: Deirdre Pittman
text: Buying a Ferrari has been my dream and I was all set to buy one too, till I found about the 488 Pista. Well I didnt want to miss my chance of owning it so I planned to wait for a little more.

name: Kaye Morse
text: The fact that it is built with an emphasis on driving fun, with high-performance delivery, that can also be used by amateur drivers, makes it special. Also, its quality engine weighs 90 kg less than the 488 GTB.

name: Oscar French
text: Being a fan of the Ferrari brand, I can't wait for the launch of the extreme performer model that is the Ferrari 488 Pista. Talking about Ferrari cars, all of their models have something unique about themselves.

name: Rafael Hayes
text: the pricing fits perfectly with the outstanding features that the car bears in it. Along with the thundering engine, it looks aesthetically sassy and unique with the side textures that pushes the airflow.
